title: "You are not eligible to create a lobby for this queue."
body: "You are not eligible to create a lobby for this queue." its not working when i want to do next game.

replies.body: Same here I just finished a game 15-20 min ago and I'm still stuck on the reconnect screen. I think we were in the same game.

Hey, yeah per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page it looks like EU is having some login issues.  Ranked queue seems to be down as a result, in case this is what the thread is referring to.
Don't restart your client because you'll be stuck on reconnect screen.
Hey what queue is this for exactly?  If it's Draft for example, you'll need to have enough champions in your pool similarly to ranked since bans are featured.
